General.Name: Sun Residential Real Estate Investment Trust
General.Description: Sun Residential Real Estate Investment Trust is an unincorporated open-ended real estate investment trust established pursuant to a declaration of trust dated January 22, 2019, as amended and restated on March 22, 2019 and November 4, 2020. The business of Sun is to acquire multi-family residential properties in the Sunbelt region of the United States. Its business operations commenced on January 28, 2020, when it completed a financing and concurrently acquired a 51% interest in a multi-family residential property comprising 12 buildings with 288 rental units as well as various amenitiesfor tenants located in Tallahassee, Florida.
General.Address: 2300 - 130 King Street West, Toronto, ON, Canada, ON M5X 1C8
